text: Soni (kumbuchilani) lisiku lyatuchijitumisya mboni ku nkutula uliose jakuumila mu wanganyapeo jichijachonjela, ni tuchiyika namwe (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ) kuwa mboni pa wanganyawa. Soni tuntuluchisye Chitabu (Qur’an) chachikusalichisya chindu chilichose, chachili soni chongolo, chanasa ni abali jakusengwasya kwa Asilamu
